Dr. rer. nat.

So, finally, almost 5 months after my successful dissertation, I have just ended all paperwork, bureaucracy, publish the thesis, … and just got it:




From now on, for the rest of my life, I hold the title of “Dr. rer. nat.” (Doctor of natural things).

I am so happy :D

Cheers!!


PD: and now back to prepare the presentation for tomorrow!!
